decoder.name: cisco-asa-dynamic-filter
decoder.order: id, description

decoder.name: cisco-asa-ips
decoder.order: id, description

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-translation
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, duration

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-connection-tcpudp
decoder.order: id, description, connection, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, duration, bytes

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-connection-gre
decoder.order: id, description, connection, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, duration, bytes

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-connection-icmp
decoder.order: id, description, connection, src, src_ip, src_port, mapped_src_ip, mapped_src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, mapped_dst_ip, mapped_dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-stub-connection
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) for (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) duration (\d+:\d+:\d+) forwarded bytes (\d+) reason (\.+)
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, duration, bytes, reason

decoder.name: cisco-asa-teardown-pppoe
decoder.order: id, description, interface, tunnel_id, remote-peer

decoder.name: cisco-asa-built-translation
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-built-connection
decoder.order: id, description, connection, src, src_ip, src_port, mapped_src_ip, mapped_src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, mapped_dst_ip, mapped_dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-built-pptp
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) at (\S+), tunnel-id = (\d+), remote-peer = (\S+), virtual-interface = (\d+), client-dynamic-ip = (\S+), username = (\S+), MPPE-key-strength = (\d+)
decoder.order: id, description, if_name, tunnel_id, remote_peer, virtual_if, client_dyn_ip, user, MPPE_key_strength

decoder.name: cisco-asa-built-localhost
decoder.order: id, description, zone_name, ip_address

decoder.name: cisco-asa-no-matching-connection
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) error message: (\S+) src (\S+):(\S+) dst (\S+):(\S+) (\(\.*\)) on (\S+) interface
decoder.order: id, description, protocol, src, src_ip, dst, dst_ip, code, interface

decoder.name: cisco-asa-inbound-connection-denied
decoder.order: id, description, src_ip, src_port, dst_ip, dst_port, flags, interface

decoder.name: cisco-asa-inbound-socket
decoder.order: id, description, context_ID

decoder.name: cisco-asa-inbound-thread
decoder.order: id, description, context_ID

decoder.name: cisco-asa-attacks
decoder.order: id, srcip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-shunned
decoder.order: id, srcip, dstip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-deny-land-attack
decoder.order: id, description, src_ip, dst_ip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-deny-inbound-udp
decoder.order: id, description, src_ip, src_port, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-fw2
decoder.order: id, protocol, action, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: cisco-asa-fw3
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: cisco-asa-fw6
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport, flags, interface

decoder.name: cisco-asa-url-success
decoder.order: id, srcip, dstip, url

decoder.name: cisco-asa-url-deny
decoder.order: id, action, url, srcip, dstip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-srcip
decoder.order: id, srcip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-srcip-port
decoder.order: id, action, srcip, srcport, interface, dstip, dstport, user

decoder.name: cisco-asa-drop-rate-exceeded
decoder.regex: (\w+): Object drop rate (\d+) exceeded. Current burst rate is (\S+) per second, max configured rate is (\S+); Current average rate is (\S+) per second, max configured rate is (\S+); Cumulative total count is (\S+)
decoder.order: id, rate_ID, burst_rate, max_burst_rate, average_rate, max_average_rate, cumulative_count

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-logged-out
decoder.order: id, description, username

decoder.name: cisco-asa-executed-command
decoder.order: id, username, type, command

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-privileged-changed
decoder.order: id, description, username, from_level, to_level

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-flow-dropped
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) is dropped because application has failed
decoder.order: id, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-flow-skipped
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) is skipped because application has failed
decoder.order: id, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-flow-bypassed
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) bypassed application checking because the protocol is not supported
decoder.order: id, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-deny-inbound-icmp
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, dst, dst_ip, code

decoder.name: cisco-asa-dynamic-filter-dropped-blacklisted
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) \S+ to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) \S+, destination \S+ resolved from dynamic list: \S+, threat-level: (\S+), category: (\S+)
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, threat_level, category

decoder.name: cisco-asa-timeout-removing-rule
decoder.order: id, address, hostname

decoder.name: cisco-asa-invalid-transport-field
decoder.order: id, protocol, src_ip, src_port, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-failed-update_from-dynamic-filter
decoder.order: id, description, server, reason

decoder.name: cisco-asa-denied-invalid-icmp
decoder.order: id, description, code, src, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, icmp_id, icmp_type

decoder.name: cisco-asa-discard-ip-fragment
decoder.order: id, description, src, dst, protocol, fragment_id

decoder.name: cisco-asa-ips-drop-package
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-adding-rule
decoder.regex: (\w+): Address (\S+) discovered for domain (\S+) from (\S+), Adding rule
decoder.order: id, address, domain, type

decoder.name: cisco-asa-sfr-requested-drop
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-denied-icmp
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) type=(\S+), from laddr (\S+) on interface (\S+) to (\S+): (\.+)
decoder.order: id, description, src_ip, interface, dst_ip, reason

decoder.name: cisco-asa-dropped-dns-request
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-dynamic-filter-monitored
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) \(\S+\) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) \(\S+\), destination \S+ resolved from dynamic list: \S+, threat-level: (\S+), category: (\S+)
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port, threat_level, category

decoder.name: cisco-asa-user-running-executed
decoder.order: id, username, running, ip, type, command

decoder.name: cisco-asa-license-expire
decoder.order: id, description, key, days

decoder.name: cisco-asa-module-ips
decoder.order: id, module_id, app_up, version

decoder.name: cisco-asa-duplicate-syn
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+):(\S+)/(\S+) with different initial sequence number
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-response-collision
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) from (\S+)/(\S+) on interface (\S+) with existing ARP entry \S+/(\S+)
decoder.order: id, description, src_ip, new_arp, interface, existing_arp

decoder.name: cisco-asa-through-the-device
decoder.order: id, description, protocol, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-classification-dropped-connection
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-deny-teardrop-fragment
decoder.order: id, description, size, offset, src, dst

decoder.name: cisco-asa-bad-hdr-length
decoder.regex: (\w+): (\.+) \(hdrlen=(\S+), pktlen=(\S+)\) from (\S+)/(\S+) to (\S+)/(\S+), flags: (\.+), on interface (\S+)
decoder.order: id, description, hdrlen, pktlen, src_ip, src_port, dst_ip, dst_port, flags, interface

decoder.name: cisco-asa-pat-pool-exhausted
decoder.order: id, description, src, src_ip, src_port, dst, dst_ip, dst_port

decoder.name: cisco-asa-lost-failover
decoder.order: id, description, interface

decoder.name: cisco-asa-deny-flows
decoder.order: id, description, log, limit

decoder.name: cisco-asa-attempting-fallback
decoder.order: id, description, username, message

decoder.name: cisco-asa-task-ran
decoder.order: id, description, time, process, pc, call_stack

decoder.name: cisco-asa-line-protocol-interface
decoder.order: id, description, interface, action

decoder.name: cisco-asa-clock-set
decoder.order: id, description, source, ip, before, after

decoder.name: cisco-asa-inbound-protocol
decoder.order: id, description, protocol, origin 1, src_ip, origin 2, dst_ip

decoder.name: cisco-asa-data-channel
decoder.regex: (\w+): (Module ips experienced a data channel communication failure, data channel is \w+)
decoder.order: id, description

decoder.name: cisco-asa-memory-allocation
decoder.order: id, description

decoder.name: cisco-asa-system-memory
decoder.order: id, description, percentage

decoder.name: cisco-asa-ip-collision
decoder.regex: (\w+): (IP address collision) detected between host (\S+) at (\S+) and interface (\S+), (\S+)
decoder.order: id, description, host_ip, src_mac, interface, int_mac_address

decoder.name: cisco-asa-generic
decoder.order: id
